name: verbose_level
longdoc: Verbosity level for information logging 0: Only errors 1: Warning 2: Information 3: Debug

name: base_dir
shortdoc: Relative base path for all other paths
longdoc: Important: any other path that not have a leading '/' indicating an absolute path will be considered as having base_dir as root

name: experiment
shortdoc: Experimental parameters - fixed at point of data collection

name: path
shortdoc: Experiment/reconstruction file to load scan parameters and data from

name: rotation
shortdoc: Rotation of scan coordinates counter clockwise

name: offset
shortdoc: Random offsets applied to regular grid. +- % of dR

name: distance
shortdoc: Distance from the focal plane to the specimen plane
